about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Passionate about technology and entrepreneurship, I began my career as an electrician at SNCF before moving into web development. This unusual path gave me valuable versatility and adaptability.

An entrepreneur at heart, I founded and managed several businesses, including a car rental company and a fast-food restaurant. These experiences taught me to solve complex problems, manage teams and develop a strategic vision.
Recently I worked for Rino Recycling in Brisbane, where I put my technical skills and creativity to work on innovative projects.
about.quote: Each project I touch is an opportunity to go further than expected of me.
careerList: Former electrician (SNCF), environmental technician and delivery agent
Web developer trained at Le Wagon Paris (2023)
Recent experience: Rino Recycling in Brisbane (Nov. 2024 â€“ April 2025)

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: My diverse professional background demonstrates my versatility and adaptability.

items.title: Web Developer
items.description: Intensive full-stack web development training. Practical projects and teamwork on complete web applications.

items.title: Operations Manager
items.description: Management of recycling operations and development of new optimization processes.

items.title: Librarian & Courier
items.description: Organization and management of the document collection. Delivery service with autonomous route management.

items.title: Electrician
items.description: Installation and maintenance of electrical systems. Troubleshooting and compliance with safety standards.

items.title: Restaurant Service
items.description: High-end customer service in an international environment.

items.title: Environmental Technician
items.description: Analysis and monitoring of environmental indicators. Raising public awareness of ecological issues.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Do you have a project in mind or an opportunity for me? Feel free to contact me. I'm always open to new collaborations and challenges.

form.disclaimer: By submitting this form, you agree your data will be used only so I can contact you.
